thread.title: Lauryn Hill Will Schedule Another Pittsburgh Performance After Arriving Hours Late For Show
thread.title_full: Lauryn Hill Will Schedule Another Pittsburgh Performance After Arriving Hours Late For Show

author: CBS Pittsburgh
title: Lauryn Hill Will Schedule Another Pittsburgh Performance After Arriving Hours Late For Show

organizations.name: lauryn hill will schedule another pittsburgh performance

text:
Lauryn Hill Will Schedule Another Pittsburgh Performance After Arriving Hours Late For Show February 2, 2017 11:25 AM Filed Under: Heinz Hall , Lauryn Hill , Pittsburgh NEW YORK - NOVEMBER 13: (EXCLUSIVE ACCESS - PREMIUM RATES APPLY) Singer Lauryn Hill performs during the Michael J. Fox Foundation's 2010 Benefit "A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to Cure Parkinson's" at The Waldorf=Astoria on November 13, 2010 in New York City. (Photo by Andrew H. Walker/Getty Images for the Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson's Research) 
PITTSBURGH (KDKA) — Singer Lauryn Hill has a message for fans in Pittsburgh. 
She says she’s sorry for taking the stage three hours late at Heinz Hall Wednesday. To my fans in Pittsburgh: pic.twitter.com/uex4awMM2R 
— Ms. Lauryn Hill (@MsLaurynHill) February 2, 2017 
Hill says her band got stuck at the airport in New York, due to bad weather. She admits, in hindsight, she should’ve canceled the concert instead of making fans wait. 
She says they’re working on setting up another performance in Pittsburgh later this month.
